**Contaminated Sites and Environmental Compliance Services Tender Notice**
====================================================================

**Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Publication Date**: October 20, 2022

**Tender Closing Date**: December 13, 2022, at 13:00 Eastern Time

**Tender Reference Number**: PW-22-01010677

**Summary**

Defence Construction Canada (DCC) is hereby issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for Contaminated Sites and Environmental Compliance Services for the Nunavut Territory.

**Scope of Services**

The Contractor will be required to provide "as and when required" contaminated sites assessment and monitoring services, including:

1. Environmental Site Assessment (ESA), monitoring, and remediation projects
2. Environmental compliance monitoring, audits, and inspections
3. Providing advice on infrastructure-related environmental management issues

**Notice Details**

* **GSIN Categories**: Environmental Assessment (R&D), Environmental Impact Studies, Soil Studies, Hazardous Substance Analysis - Building Related, and others [list GSIN categories as per original source]
* **Trade Agreements**: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), and World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* **Government of Canada Terms and Conditions**: excluding those related to security requirements
* **Tender Description**: Contact Eric Ndayambaza, Coordinator, Contract Services, Defence Construction Canada, for any questions or inquiries regarding this RFP.

**Eligibility**
Only Canadian-owned and controlled
companies with the required expertise will be eligible to submit bids.

All bids must be submitted through the Government of Canada's Gowin Bid Result online platform.

**Evaluation Criteria**

A shortlist of bidders will be selected based on their expertise and experience related to contaminated sites and environmental compliance services. Evaluation criteria will be detailed in the RFP document.

**Bids**

Single-stage, open-bidding process. Bidders must submit their proposals electronically.

Contact Information
----------------

Eric Ndayambaza
DCC Contract Services
Phone: +1 (343) 576-9347
Email: Eric.Ndayambaza@dcc-cdc.gc.ca

Note:
Please ensure that your bid is submitted on time, and all bidders must have an active Contractor and Supplier Paid Administration System (CSPAS) profile to submit bids. Failure to do so may result in the bid being rejected. Should you have any questions, please contact Eric Ndayambaza.
